func arg: (data, index, dtype, name, copy, fastpath, dtype_if_empty)
comments:
Helper to pass an explicit dtype when instantiating an empty Series.

This silences a DeprecationWarning described in GitHub-17261.

Parameters ---------- data : Mirrored from Series.__init__ index : Mirrored from Series.__init__ dtype : Mirrored from Series.__init__ name : Mirrored from Series.__init__ copy : Mirrored from Series.__init__ fastpath : Mirrored from Series.__init__ dtype_if_empty : str, numpy.dtype, or ExtensionDtype This dtype will be passed explicitly if an empty Series will be instantiated.
##### Returns
